Name: Time Keeper
About the game: Play as Tic Toc, a small windup robot who is tasked with repairing the Cosmic Clock. Avoid hazards, flip switches, activate devices and solve mechanical puzzles. It's all in a days work for an apprentice Time Keeper, are you up to the challenge? Use your game controller (or keyboard) to find lost parts, locate keys to locked switches and explore your way through ever challenging environments. Did we mention the Temporal Crystals or the Time Scepter? Well you're going to need those, but you'll have to conquer the Dark Zones first. Hey if it were easy, everyone would do it. Features Over 250 inventive 'cause and effect' mechanical puzzles 40+ levels to explore across 5 unique environments Engaging cinematic story line and inspiring sound track Generous save points so puzzle resets and deaths are quick and painless Achievements, Collectibles, alternate timelines and a few surprises Helpful Devices Utilize helpful mechanical devices in your quest to restore the Master Mechanisms of the Cosmic Clock. Discover their abilities and use them to progress and achieve your goals.
